pm.test("The notification rule has not been updated, because the user does not have sufficient rights.", function () {

pm.test("The notification rule has not been deleted, because the user does not have sufficient rights.", function () {
pm.expect(responseJson.message).to.eql("You are not allowed to delete a notification configuration");
pm.test("The notification rule has not been deleted, because the user does not have sufficient rights.", function () {
pm.expect(responseJson.message).to.eql("You are not allowed to delete a notification configuration");
pm.test("Logout successful. The displayed message is the one that is expected ('Successful logout').", function() {
